ComicInfo.Summary: Brandon Jerwa (Battlestar Galactica, GI Joe) brings us a hilarious tale of what happens when the last zombie and the last cheerleader alive have to co-exist. Plus, two other wicked stories. Covers by Daniel Campos, Pasquale Qualano, Joe Pekar, and Ben Tan. The back cover is sketch friendly!
ComicInfo.Title: A Piece of Work; Hall-Pass; Finality
